mapper.update: update friends set friend_id = #{friendId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, friend_name = #{friendName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, friend_type = #{friendType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, friend_group_type = #{friendGroupType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where friends_id = #{friendsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select friends_id, friend_id, user_id, friend_name, friend_type, friend_group_type from friends
